concept.title: Tic-Tac-Toe Tactics
concept.description: A strategic 2D top-down game where players engage in intense Tic-Tac-Toe battles on a dynamic grid, using unique character abilities and tactical power-ups to outmaneuver their opponents.
concept.objective: To win a set number of Tic-Tac-Toe matches against increasingly challenging opponents.
mechanics: Placing 'X' or 'O' markers on a 3x3 grid to form lines.
Activating unique character abilities before or after placing a marker.
Collecting and deploying tactical power-ups to influence the game board.
player_abilities: Teleport Marker: Swap the position of two of your markers on the board.
Blocker Beam: Place a temporary barrier that prevents the opponent from placing a marker in a chosen cell for one turn.
Double Mark: Place two of your markers in a single turn (can only be used once per match).

enemies.name: The Glitch
enemies.behavior: Attempts to randomly place markers, occasionally makes strategic moves to block the player.

enemies.name: The Strategist
enemies.behavior: Calculates optimal moves to win, prioritizes blocking player wins.

enemies.name: The Mastermind
enemies.behavior: Employs advanced tactics, anticipates player moves, and uses abilities strategically to secure victory.

powerups.name: Grid Shift
powerups.effect: Randomly shuffles the positions of all current markers on the board.

powerups.name: Marker Erase
powerups.effect: Removes one of the opponent's markers from the board.

concept.level_progression: Players advance by defeating a series of AI opponents, each with increasing difficulty. New abilities and power-ups are unlocked as players progress through leagues or stages.
concept.scoring_system: Points are awarded for each Tic-Tac-Toe win. Bonus points are awarded for winning with specific abilities or power-ups, or for achieving a win in a minimal number of moves.
concept.visual_style: Clean, pixelated art with bright, contrasting neon colors. The game board is a central, illuminated arena, with characters depicted as stylized, futuristic avatars.
concept.sound_theme: Upbeat, chiptune-inspired electronic music with distinct sound effects for placing markers, activating abilities, and winning/losing.

level_design.name: The Grand Opening Gambit
level_design.description: Welcome to Tic-Tac-Toe Tactics! This introductory level will guide you through the core mechanics. Your objective is to outwit the opponent by strategically placing your markers and utilizing your unique abilities. Collect the scattered power-ups and learn to adapt your strategy to overcome the initial challenges.

assets.player: A neon blue, pixelated triangle with sharp edges, slightly larger than other shapes.

enemies.basic: A neon green, pixelated square. Simple and static.
enemies.aggressive: A neon red, pixelated diamond shape that pulses slightly.

powerups.health: A small, bright pink pixelated circle that glows.
powerups.speed: A small, bright yellow pixelated lightning bolt shape.

obstacles.wall: Thick, solid black pixelated rectangles with a faint neon purple outline.
obstacles.rock: Rough, grey pixelated irregular blobs with small, scattered white pixels.

assets.background: A dark, starry void with thin, glowing neon grid lines that form perspective.

ui_elements.score: White pixelated numbers displayed in a small, rectangular box with a thin neon cyan border.
ui_elements.health_bar: A horizontal bar divided into segmented blocks. Each block is filled with neon orange and empties to reveal a black background.
